## Fixed

- Fixed inconsistent HTTP status semantics where some request-level misses were reported as `404`; `404` is now reserved for unknown API paths, while `/edit` and `/patch` report request errors as `HTTP 400` with JSON error payload. / 修复了 HTTP 状态码语义不一致的问题：`404` 现在仅用于“API 路径不存在”，`/edit` 与 `/patch` 的未命中/不满足条件改为 `HTTP 400` + 错误 JSON。
- Fixed `SKILL.md` documentation for HTTP status codes to match actual behavior. / 修复了 `SKILL.md` 中关于 HTTP 状态码的说明，使其与实现一致。

## Changed

- Added a short project description to README and a pointer to `SKILL.md` for AI Agent usage. / README 增加简要说明，并引导 AI Agent 阅读 `SKILL.md`。
